column4: I'm not sure what you are trying to do - whatever it is though is not officially supported in ubuntu, perhaps if you explain your needs we can offer you a supported solution
i am looking for a similar solution which allows me to control ubuntu desktop from outside LAN

do you have administrator access to your router? if so it would be as easy as opening a port and using the remote desktop that is built into gnome which is called VNC the programs you would be using are vino for the server and vinagre as the client ... or you can use SSH tunnelling and X Forwarding .. which is a little more complicated
